story_teamgalactic_02_05000/2401_1201_01:
Ugh...it’s so cold, even Skuntank’s tail is
frozen upside down!
story_teamgalactic_02_05000/2401_1201_02:
Wasn’t its tail like that already? Don’t just make
things up!
story_teamgalactic_02_05000/2401_1201_03:
Sheesh, I was just trying to be nice and make
some conversation.
story_teamgalactic_02_05000/2401_1201_04:
Why’d I have to partner up with you, anyway?
Putting us together... It’s like they’re asking for a
fight to happen.
story_teamgalactic_02_05000/2401_1201_06: Of course not. Master Cyrus comes first right now.
story_teamgalactic_02_05000/2401_1201_07:
Also...even if we did battle, I’m not sure I’d be
able to beat you again.
story_teamgalactic_02_05000/2401_1201_08: I can tell you’ve gotten stronger.
story_teamgalactic_02_05000/2401_1201_09: Oh... Well, that’s nice of you to say.
story_teamgalactic_02_05000/2401_1201_10: Y’know, after I lost to you...
story_teamgalactic_02_05000/2401_1201_11:
I had this feeling that I had to get stronger. But
it wasn’t because I was worried about winning or
losing. You know what I mean?
story_teamgalactic_02_05000/2401_1201_12: You get it, right? Since you’re the same.
story_teamgalactic_02_05000/2401_1201_13:
After all, you’re fighting really hard for someone
you believe in now.
story_teamgalactic_02_05000/2401_1201_14:
When you put things on the line for someone else
and not just yourself, that’s what makes you
super strong.
story_teamgalactic_02_05000/2401_1201_16: Then let’s hurry up and find Master Cyrus.
story_teamgalactic_02_05000/2401_1201_17:
After that, we can have a rematch to see which of
us has gotten stronger.
